name: 15 Question Geography Quiz: Fractured Nations | Geography - Wordplay

questions.explanation:
Afghanistan.

	Did you know the Taliban executes women for crimes such as prostitution and adultery?

questions.correct: United States of America & The United States of America & USA & U.S.A. & US & U.S.
questions.explanation:
United States of America & The United States of America & USA & U.S.A. & US & U.S.

	May we be wise and fair. Long live freedom of speech and religion. Terrorism shall never prevail.

Uzbekistan & Uzbekhistan.

	Part of the former Soviet Union. On Afghanistan's northeastern border.

Kuwait.

	The U.S. fought the Gulf War to get the Iraqis out of there.

Ukraine.

	Part of the former Soviet Union.

Norway.

	A nation of northwestern Europe.

United Kingdom & U.K. & UK

	Hooray for Tony Blair! What a great orator!

Portugal.

	West of Spain. The Portuguese brought their language to Brazil.

Belarus.

	Part of the former USSR. Close ties with Russia.
